COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Computer communication protocols and systems, including classic and contemporary literature. The emphasis is on conceptual issues in the design and implementation of computer internetworks.
DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Advanced high-performance computer simulation techniques; multiscale deterministic and stochastic simulation algorithms on parallel and distributed computing platforms; immersive and interactive visualization of simulation data. Prerequisite: CSCI 596.
DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

COURSE_DESCRIPTION: Advanced high-performance computer simulation techniques; multiscale deterministic and stochastic simulation algorithms on parallel and distributed computing platforms; immersive and interactive visualization of simulation data. Prerequisite: CSCI 596.
DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

(Duplicates credit in former CSCI 562)
DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

Recommended preparation: familiarity with algorithms and disc rete mathematics. Open only to doctoral students.
DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

DEPTOWNERNAME: Andrew and Erna Viterbi School of Engineering

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: Dana and David Dornsife College of Letters, Arts and Sciences

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications

DEPTOWNERNAME: LAS- Social Science & Communications
